item.title: 大选后，BancTrust 计划组织债券投资者赴委内瑞拉考察
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资银行 BancTrust & Co.正在为持有委内瑞拉 600 亿美元违约债务的投资者组织一次罕见的委内瑞拉之旅。【原文：Investment bank BancTrust & Co. is organizing a rare trip to Venezuela for investors who hold some of the nation’s $60 billion in defaulted debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）在新任首席执行官上任前出现四年来最严重亏损
item.description: 对于当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）来说，无论谁来重振石油生产并削减该公司近 1,000 亿美元的债务负担，这都是一个不利的信号。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos’ posted its worst loss since the global pandemic emerged more than four years ago, a negative signal for whoever President-elect Claudia Sheinbaum chooses to revive oil production and slash the company’s almost-$100 billion debt burden.】

item.title: 2,690 亿美元小额贷款销售的巨大需求令买家蠢蠢欲动
item.description: 每周 90 亿美元的国家和地方政府新债销售市场现在已经非常拥挤，投资者不得不在寻找价值时发挥创意。【原文：The $9 billion-a-week market for new sales of state and local government debt is now so crowded that investors are being forced to get creative in their hunt for value.】

item.title: 对冲基金在英国央行干预 2022 年货币政策前数小时大举买入吉尔伯特债券
item.description: 据英国央行的研究显示，在英国央行两年前宣布一项特殊的债券购买计划以阻止大甩卖之前，一小群对冲基金以最低价格抢购了金边债券。【原文：A small group of hedge funds snapped up gilts at rock-bottom prices hours before the Bank of England announced an extraordinary bond-purchase program two years ago to stem a fire sale, according to research from the central bank.】

item.title: 世界顶级铜供应商 Codelco 产量下降
item.description: 智利铜业公司（Codelco）公布上半年铜产量下降，原因是其智利矿山和项目遭遇挫折，削弱了这家国有企业对全球最大金属供应商头衔的控制。【原文：Codelco posted a decline in first-half copper production as setbacks at its Chilean mines and projects loosen the state-owned firm’s grip on the title of world’s biggest supplier of the metal.】

item.title: 贝莱德、埃利奥特等泰晤士河债权人主导危机谈判
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，泰晤士水务公司的债权人（包括贝莱德公司和埃利奥特投资管理公司）组成了一个协调委员会，与这家陷入困境的公用事业公司就债务重组方案展开谈判。【原文：A group of Thames Water’s creditors including BlackRock Inc. and Elliott Investment Management LP formed a coordination committee as talks kicked off with the struggling utility over options to restructure its debt load, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚领导人回击全国抗议呼吁
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）试图化解就该国生活费用危机举行全国性抗议活动的呼声，同时抨击组织者煽动 "愤怒"。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu sought to diffuse calls for nationwide protests over the country’s cost-of-living crisis, while slamming the organizers for fermenting “anger.”】

item.title: Centene 公司高管对医疗补助成本做出保证后股价大涨
item.description: Centene 公司的股价创下了自 2022 年以来的最大涨幅，因为这家医疗保险公司第二季度的业绩似乎缓解了投资者对医疗补助成本将使该行业利润紧张的担忧。【原文：Centene Corp. shares jumped the most since 2022 as the health insurer’s second-quarter results appeared to ease investors’ concerns that Medicaid costs would strain the industry’s profits.】

item.title: 美联储在制定清算计划后结束银门执法行动
item.description: 美联储表示，在银门银行完成清盘计划、偿还存款并停止银行运作后，美联储已结束对该银行及其控股公司的执法行动。【原文：The Federal Reserve said that it had ended its enforcement action against Silvergate Bank and its holding company after the lender completed its wind-down plan, paid back deposits and stopped functioning as a bank.】

item.title: 阿波罗与银行商讨 Brightspeed 债务重组事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and a group of banks led by Bank of America Corp and Barclays Plc have been holding restructuring talks for a slug of Brightspeed debt that could see the banks take a loss, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币政治捐款比银行家弗里德时代的捐款还多
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）明天将在比特币会议上与财大气粗的捐赠者会面，这只是数字资产领域在当前政治竞选周期中重新崭露头角的冰山一角。【原文：Donald Trump’s meeting with deep-pocketed donors at a Bitcoin conference tomorrow is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to the renewed prominence of the digital-asset sector in the current political campaign cycle.】

item.title: 顾问称美国取代非洲成为全球石油供应国
item.description: 据咨询公司 Renaissance Energy Advisors 称，美国原油 WTI Midland 已取代西非石油，成为大西洋盆地和亚洲之间市场的摇摆供应商。【原文：American crude grade WTI Midland has replaced West African oil as the swing supplier for markets between the Atlantic Basin and Asia, according to consultancy Renaissance Energy Advisors.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司正在洽谈收购南非航空公司股份事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）正在洽谈收购南非 SA Airlink Pty Ltd.公司的股份，这家总部位于多哈的航空公司正努力扩大其在非洲大陆的业务。【原文：Qatar Airways is in talks to buy a stake in South Africa’s SA Airlink Pty Ltd. as the Doha-based airline seeks to expand its presence on the continent, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.description: 继推出持有以太坊加密货币的 ETF 之后，野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：On the heels of the launch of ETFs that hold the Ethereum cryptocurrency, Nomura Holdings Inc.’s digital-asset unit plans to offer a higher yielding alternative that includes a key component US issuers likely left out to help win regulatory approval.】

item.title: 古巴急需美元，禁止企业从美国银行转账
item.description: 古巴正在禁止其新生代企业家使用美国银行账户，以便在苏联解体以来最严重的经济危机中将美元留在古巴岛内。【原文：Cuba is banning its nascent class of entrepreneurs from using US bank accounts in a bid to keep dollars inside the island amid its worst economic crisis since the Soviet Union’s collapse.】

item.title: 伯纳德-阿诺特确认持有历峰集团 "极少量股份
item.description: 伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）证实他购买了卡地亚所有者历峰集团（Richemont）的一小部分股份，而竞争对手奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的首席执行官正试图平息外界对其意图的猜测。【原文：Bernard Arnault confirmed he bought a small stake in Cartier owner Richemont, as the chief executive officer of rival luxury conglomerate LVMH seeks to cool speculation about his intentions.】

item.title: 雀巢分析师在下调评级时问 "我们错在哪里？
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestle SA）的分析师们纷纷下调了对该公司股票的建议，因为他们担心这家消费公司将难以推动利润增长，从而对该公司的一致评级为四年来最负面。【原文：Nestle SA analysts are cutting their recommendations on the stock in droves on worries that the consumer company will struggle to drive profit growth, leaving it with most negative consensus rating in four years.】

item.title: 美联储前景为被遗忘的加拿大小盘股带来顺风
item.description: 由于通胀降温和交易活动激增，加拿大小盘股（不受青睐且经常被忽视）掀起了一股浪潮。【原文：Canadian small-cap stocks – unloved and often ignored – have caught a wave, thanks to cooling inflation and a surge in deal activity.】

item.title: 尼日利亚货币再次下滑，与中央银行的措施背道而驰
item.description: 尼日利亚的奈拉已跌至四个月低点，无视央行为支撑奈拉而采取的行动，包括在本周早些时候连续第 12 次会议上提高利率。【原文：Nigeria’s naira has weakened to a four-month low, defying central bank action to shore it up including increasing interest rates for a 12th-straight meeting earlier this week.】

item.title: 法国电力集团（EDF）总裁称法国太阳能发电补贴需要审查
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）首席执行官吕克-雷蒙（Luc Remont）敦促法国政策制定者审查对太阳能发电的补贴，称这些措施给电网增加了过多的发电量，并在电力需求持续低迷的情况下损害了核电巨头的财务状况。【原文：Electricite de France SA Chief Executive Officer Luc Remont urged French policymakers to review subsidies for solar power, saying the measures add too much generation to the grid and undermine the nuclear giant’s finances as electricity demand remains subdued.】

item.title: 数据支持 9 月降息，国债反弹
item.description: 由于美联储最青睐的通胀指标巩固了交易商对 9 月降息的预期，国债在波动的一周结束时上涨。【原文：Treasuries are rising at the end of a volatile week as the Federal Reserve’s favorite inflation gauge cemented traders’ expectations for an interest-rate cut in September.】

item.title: 世界第二大柑橘运输商再次向 WTO 欧盟争端解决小组发出呼吁
item.description: 南非要求世界贸易组织成立两个小组，审查该国所说的对其出口到欧盟的柑橘采取的 "不科学和歧视性措施"。【原文：South Africa asked the World Trade Organization to set up two panels to examine what the nation says are “unscientific and discriminatory measures” placed on citrus it exports to the European Union.】

item.title: 中国经济低速增长令全球石油前景黯淡
item.description: 中国为启动其停滞不前的经济所做的努力导致人们预测今年余下时间的燃料消费将更加疲软，从而使全球石油需求前景更加暗淡。【原文：China’s struggle to kick start its stuttering economy has spawned forecasts of weaker fuels consumption during the rest of this year, darkening the global demand outlook for oil.】

item.title: 加拿大准备将石油管道销售推迟至 2025 年大选之后
item.description: 据熟悉内部讨论情况的官员透露，贾斯汀-特鲁多总理的政府可能会将跨山石油管道的销售推迟到 2025 年加拿大全国大选之后。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government is likely to stall the sale of the Trans Mountain oil pipeline until after Canada’s national election in 2025, according to officials familiar with internal discussions.】

item.title: J.尽管利润下滑，但马丁斯仍承诺在波兰实行低价销售
item.description: 杰罗尼莫-马丁斯股份公司（Jeronimo Martins SGPS SA）将继续在其市场领先的波兰 Biedronka 连锁店提供低价，以吸引更多客户，尽管激烈的价格战正在损害利润并使公司市值缩水数十亿美元。【原文：Jeronimo Martins SGPS SA will continue to offer low prices at its market-leading Biedronka chain in Poland to lure more clients, even as a fierce price war is hurting profits and wiping out billions from the company’s market value.】

item.title: Mankind 委托巴克莱银行和德意志银行出资 16 亿美元进行收购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Mankind Pharma Ltd.已选择巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）为其拟以 1,380 亿卢比（16 亿美元）收购 Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd.的交易安排融资。【原文：Mankind Pharma Ltd. has picked Barclays Plc and Deutsche Bank AG to help arrange financing for its proposed 138 billion rupees ($1.6 billion) acquisition of Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 量化基金 Kbit 称，尽管 ETF 收益迅速，但仍应继续投资加密货币
item.description: 虽然对冲基金正在部署诸如基差交易等久经考验的策略，以从最近大量涌入的美国比特币和以太坊 ETF 中获利，但量化基金 Kbit 称，坚持在数字资产领域内发展将被证明更有利可图。【原文：While hedge funds are deploying tried-and-true strategies such as the basis trade to profit from the recent influx of US Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, the quantitative fund Kbit says sticking within the digital asset world will prove to be more lucrative.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会起诉安德鲁-莱福特和香橼资本卖空股票
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）起诉做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）和香橼资本公司（Citron Capital），称其股票交易与社交媒体帖子和研究报告有关。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission sued short-seller Andrew Left and Citron Capital over stock trading related to social media posts and research reports.】
